description: Taka-taka is http://anidb.net/ch32918 [Kagami]`s hawk and the oldest of the animals living at Kagami`s and http://anidb.net/ch8587 [Yukino]`s place. He is able to fly even while carrying a human on his back; being a childhood friend of Kagami she gets priority over Yukino in case of need. Taka-taka`s best friend amongst the animals is http://anidb.net/ch44093 [Karaage] even though both had been rivals in their childhood.
name: Taka-taka
